thread.title_full: Dulquer Salmaan's next with Amal Neerad titled CIA : Celebrities, News - India Today

title: Dulquer Salmaan's next with Amal Neerad titled CIA : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
Celebrities Dulquer Salmaan's next with Amal Neerad titled CIA Dulquer Salmaan took to Twitter and released the first look poster of his upcoming film titled CIA: Comrade in America. IndiaToday.in | Written by Srivatsan A + A - Dulquer's CIA poster 
Basking in the success of the family drama Jomonte Suvisheshangal, Dulquer Salmaan is teaming up with director Amal Neerad for a Malayalam flick titled CIA: Comrade in America. 
ALSO READ | Vivegam- Dhanush to Rana Daggubati, celebs laud Ajith's chiselled torso 
Announcing the news on Twitter, Dulquer wrote, "At long last here is the title for my Amal Neerad film !Hope you all love everything about the film." At long last here is the title for my Amal Neerad film !Hope you all love everything about the film â˜ºâ˜ºâ�¤â�¤ !! #CIATheFilm #ComradeinAmerica pic.twitter.com/kleBWUePGW â€” dulquer salmaan (@dulQuer) February 2, 2017 
According to reports, Karthika Muralidharan, the daughter of cinematographer CK Muralidharan has been paired opposite Dulquer, who will be playing the role of Aji John in the film. 
To be produced by Anwar Rasheed Entertainment, the film also stars Soubin Shahir, Jinu Joseph and John Vijay in supporting roles. 
Music composer Gopi Sunder, who gave wonderful albums last year with films like Pulimurugan, Thozha and Devi has been roped in to compose music. 
Meanwhile, Dulquer's latest release Jomonte Suvisheshangal opened to great response from critics and audience. 
The ABCD star, who had two releases last year, is joining hands with filmmaker Bejoy Nambiar for a Tamil-Malayalam bilingual titled Solo. 
Dulquer will also be seen in director Lal Jose's Oru Bhayankara Kamukan. The film will be scripted by Unni R, who has earlier worked with Dulquer in the superhit Charlie.
